net.javacoding.jspider.api.event
Interface EventSink

All Known Subinterfaces:
Plugin, Tool
All Known Implementing Classes:
net.javacoding.jspider.tool.impl.BaseToolImpl, DevNullPlugin, DiskWriterPlugin, FlatOutputPlugin, PluginSocket, StatusBasedFileWriterPlugin, ToolPlugin, VelocityPlugin
public interface EventSink

Interface that will be implemented upon each class that will be used as an event sink for JSpider API events. $Id: EventSink.java,v 1.3 2003/02/27 16:47:31 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey
